product_name: Genuine Innovations DLX Tire Repair Kit with UltraFlate Plus CO2 Tire Inflator
long_description: Get everything you need to fix a flat and start riding again with the DLX Tire Repair kit, which includes an UltraFlate Plus CO2 tire inflator as well as CO2 cartridges, levers and patches. Trigger-controlled inflator lets you start, and stop, inflating a tube with trigger pull or release; built-in trigger lock prevents accidental discharge. UltraFlate Plus works with both Presta and Schrader valves; accepts Genuine Innovations 12 and 16g non-threaded cartridges and 12, 16 and 25g threaded cartridges. Kit includes three 16g non-threaded CO2 cartridges, a small patch kit and 2 tire levers. DLX Tire Repair kit fits into its own zippered wallet (included) and measures 6.5 x 5.5 x 4.5 in.
short_description: Get everything you need to fix a flat and start riding again with the DLX Tire Repair kit, which includes an UltraFlate Plus CO2 tire inflator as well as CO2 cartridges, levers and patches.
